resources.name: Register
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Registers a user into the application.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| email | String | Yes | User's e-mail address.
| name | String | Yes | User's real name.
| birthAt | Date | Yes | User's birthday. May be null.
| password | String | Yes | Chosen password.
| phone | String | Yes | User's phone number.
| document | String | Yes | User's RG or CPF.

```response:200
{
  "user":{
    "id":"6238feef516c00004c00599b",
    "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
    "photo":null,
    "personId":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47",
    "person":{
      "id":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
      "name":"John Doe",
      "birthAt":"2000-01-01",
      "phone":"11987654321",
      "document":"12312312",
      "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47",
      "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47"
    }
  },
  "accessToken":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjoiNjIzOGZlZWY1MTZjMDAwMDRjMDA1OTliIn0sImlhdCI6MTY0NzkwMjQ0NywiZXhwIjoxNjQ3OTEzMjQ3fQ.fY6lKpuS6VU6u_4-oLPLst_P98y_sdztf4EaZp9uJO4"
}
```

```response:422
{
  "message":"The email field is required. (and 4 more errors)",
  "errors":{
    "email":[
      "The email field is required."
    ],
    "name":[
      "The name field is required."
    ],
    "password":[
      "The password field is required."
    ],
    "phone":[
      "The phone field is required."
    ],
    "document":[
      "The document field is required."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Logs a user into the application.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| email | String | Yes | User's e-mail address used for registration.
| password | String | Yes | User's password.

```response:200
{
  "user":{
    "id":"6235cdef117f286f635ece93",
    "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
    "photo":null,
    "personId":"6235cdef117f286f635ece92",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-19 12:34:55",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-19 12:34:55",
    "person":{
      "id":"6235cdef117f286f635ece92",
      "name":"John Doe",
      "birthAt":"2000-01-01",
      "phone":"11987654321",
      "document":"12312312",
      "createdAt":"2022-03-19 12:34:55",
      "updatedAt":"2022-03-19 12:34:55"
    }
  },
  "accessToken":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjoiNjIzNWNkZWYxMTdmMjg2ZjYzNWVjZTkzIn0sImlhdCI6MTY0Nzk4NDc0MywiZXhwIjoxNjQ3OTk1NTQzfQ.GN3ySw5Sh2GFjFoAKGTH4IyGaSX7lgdxmJTaGF2jBio"
}
```

```response:422
{
  "message":"These credentials do not match our records.",
  "errors":{
    "email":[
      "These credentials do not match our records."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: Create a contact
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Creates a contact.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| name | String | Yes | Name to identify the sender.
| email | String | Yes | E-mail to reply to.
| message | String | Yes | Contact message.

```response:200
{
  "id":"62294da94e4a0000f9000992",
  "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
  "message":"I have some ideas...",
  "personId":"62294c314e4a0000f9000990",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-10T01:00:25.130000Z",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-10T01:00:25.130000Z"
}
```

```response:422
{
  "message":"The name field is required. (and 2 more errors)",
  "errors":{
    "name":[
      "The name field is required."
    ],
    "email":[
      "The email field is required."
    ],
    "message":[
      "The message field is required."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: List all contacs
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves a list of all contacts.

Requires admin authentication.

```response:200
[
  {
    "id":"623a528119670000aa0016b4",
    "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
    "message":"I have some ideas...",
    "personId":"623a528119670000aa0016b3",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-22 22:49:37",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-22 22:49:37"
  }
]
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:403
{
  "message":"This action is unauthorized."
}
```

resources.name: Delete a contact
Show a contact
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves a contact detailed information using the given ID.

Requires the authentication user to be the owner of the contact or an system admin.

```response:200
{
  "id":"623a526e19670000aa0016b2",
  "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
  "message":"I have some ideas...",
  "personId":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-22 22:49:18",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-22 22:49:18",
  "person":{
    "id":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
    "name":"John Doe",
    "birthAt":"2000-01-01",
    "phone":"11987654321",
    "document":"12312312",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47"
  }
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Contact not found."
}
```

resources.name: List all user's contacs
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves a list of all authenticated user contacts.

```response:200
[
  {
    "id":"623a528119670000aa0016b4",
    "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
    "message":"I have some ideas...",
    "personId":"623a528119670000aa0016b3",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-22 22:49:37",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-22 22:49:37"
  }
]
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

resources.name: List all time options
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Gets the list of day and time options users must choose when creating a schedule.

Does not require authentication.

```response:200
[
  {
    "id":"6238ec72516c00004c005992",
    "day":1,
    "time":"13:59",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 21:21:54",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 21:21:54"
  },
  {
    "id":"6238ec8f516c00004c005993",
    "day":5,
    "time":"15:00",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 21:22:23",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 21:22:23"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Create a time option
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Adds an item to the list of day and time options users must choose when creating a schedule.

Requires admin authentication.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| day | Integer | Yes | Represents day of week. From 0 (Sunday) to 6 (Saturday).
| time | String | Yes | Hour available for scheduling.


```response:200
{
  "id":"622fd5dc4a2300001f004662",
  "day":1,
  "time":"13:59",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-14T23:55:08.673000Z",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-14T23:55:08.673000Z"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:403
{
  "message":"This action is unauthorized."
}
```

```response:422
{
  "message":"The day and time combination is already in use.",
  "errors":{
    "day":[
      "The day and time combination is already in use."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: Delete a time option
Restore a time option
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Restores a delete item to the list of day and time options users must choose when creating a schedule.

Requires admin authentication.

```response:200
{
  "id":"622f8d00b607000053000bc2",
  "day":"1",
  "time":"13:59",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-14T18:44:16.878000Z",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-15T00:14:36.651000Z"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:403
{
  "message":"This action is unauthorized."
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Time Option not found."
}
```

resources.name: Create a payment situation
List all payment situations
Show a payment situation
resources.description:

Retrieves detailed information about a specific payment situation.

Does not require authentication.

```response:200
{

  "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 21:52:37"
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Payment Situation not found."
}
```

Update a payment situation
Restore a payment situation

Requires admin authentication.

{

	"updatedAt": "2022-03-21 22:19:11"
}
```

{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:403
{
  "message":"This action is unauthorized."
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Payment Situation not found."
}
```
```

resources.name: List all services
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves a list of all services supported by Ferrari.

```response:200
[
  {
    "id":"6238ff35516c00004c00599c",
    "name":"Ferrari Oil Change",
    "description":"Change you Ferrari oil today!",
    "price":300,
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57"
  }
]
```

resources.name: Create a service
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Creates a Ferrari service.

Requires admin authentication.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| name | String | Yes | Service name.
| description | String | Yes | Service description.
| price | Float | Yes | Service price.

```response:200
{
  "id":"6238ff35516c00004c00599c",
  "name":"Ferrari Oil Change",
  "description":"Change you Ferrari oil today!",
  "price":300,
  "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:403
{
  "message":"This action is unauthorized."
}
```

```response:422
{
	"message": "The name field is required. (and 2 more errors)",
	"errors": {
		"name": [
			"The name field is required."
		],
		"description": [
			"The description field is required."
		],
		"price": [
			"The price field is required."
		]
	}
}
```

resources.name: Delete a service
Update a service
Show a service
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves detailed information about a Ferrari service.

```response:200
{
  "id":"6238ff35516c00004c00599c",
  "name":"Ferrari Oil Change",
  "description":"Change you Ferrari oil today!",
  "price":300,
  "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57"
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Service not found."
}
```

resources.name: Restore a service
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Restores a previously deleted Ferrari service.

Requires admin authentication.

```response:200
{
  "id":"6238ff35516c00004c00599c",
  "name":"Ferrari Oil Change",
  "description":"Change you Ferrari oil today!",
  "price":300,
  "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57"
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Service not found."
}
```

resources.name: Create a schedule
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Creates a schedule for the authenticated user.

Requires authentication.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| timeOptionId | Integer | Yes | Time Option ID chosen to the schedule.
| billingAddressId | String | Yes | Address ID to use for payment bills.
| scheduleAt | Date | Yes | Date chosen to the schedule.
| installments | Integer | Yes | Amount of installments to divide schedule's total price by.
| services | Array | Yes | Array containg ids of services user chose for the schedule.


```response:201
{
  "id":"6239021c516c00004c0059a0",
  "scheduleAt":"2022-04-08",
  "installments":1,
  "total":300,
  "completedAt":null,
  "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:54:20",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:54:20",
  "timeOptionId":"6238ff3a516c00004c00599d",
  "billingAddressId":"6238ffa0516c00004c00599f",
  "personId":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
  "timeOption":{
    "id":"6238ff3a516c00004c00599d",
    "day":5,
    "time":"15:00",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:42:02",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:42:02"
  },
  "billingAddress":{
    "id":"6238ffa0516c00004c00599f",
    "street":"Avenida Paulista",
    "number":"123",
    "complement":"de 1300\/1301 a 1498\/1499",
    "district":"Sede",
    "city":"São Paulo",
    "state":"São Paulo",
    "country":"Brasil",
    "zipcode":"15370496",
    "personId":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:43:44",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:43:44"
  },
  "person":{
    "id":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
    "name":"John Doe",
    "birthAt":"2000-01-01",
    "phone":"11987654321",
    "document":"12312312",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:40:47"
  },
  "services":[
    {
      "id":"6238ff35516c00004c00599c",
      "name":"Ferrari Oil Change",
      "description":"Change you Ferrari oil today!",
      "price":300,
      "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57",
      "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:41:57"
    }
  ]
}
```

```response:422
{
  "message":"The selected time option id is invalid. (and 3 more errors)",
  "errors":{
    "timeOptionId":[
      "The selected time option id is invalid."
    ],
    "billingAddressId":[
      "The selected billing address id is invalid."
    ],
    "scheduleAt":[
      "The schedule at day of week must be the same as given time option day of week."
    ],
    "services.0":[
      "The selected services.0 is invalid."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: Change password
Forgot password
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Sends a password recovery e-mail.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| email | String | Yes | E-mail address to send the password recovery e-mail.

```response:200
{
  "status":"We have emailed your password reset link!"
}
```

```response:400
{
  "email":"We can't find a user with that email address."
}
```

resources.name: Reset password
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Resets a user's password based on given token and e-mail.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| token | String | Yes | Reset password token.
| email | String | Yes | User's e-mail.
| password | String | Yes | Password confirmation.
| passwordConfirmation | String | Yes | New password confirmation.

```response:200
{
  "status":"Your password has been reset!"
}
```

```response:400
{
  "email":"We can't find a user with that email address."
}
```

resources.name: Me
resources.description:

Retrives authenticated user information.

```response:200
{

}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

resources.name: Update profile
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Updates authenticated user information.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| email | String | Yes | User's e-mail address.
| name | String | Yes | User's real name.
| birthAt | Date | Yes | User's birthday. May be null.
| phone | String | Yes | User's phone number.
| document | String | Yes | User's RG or CPF.

```response:200
{
  "id":"6235cdef117f286f635ece93",
  "email":"john_doe@gmail.com",
  "photo":null,
  "personId":"6235cdef117f286f635ece92",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-19 12:34:55",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-22 21:41:53",
  "person":{
    "id":"6235cdef117f286f635ece92",
    "name":"John Eduard Doe",
    "birthAt":null,
    "phone":"5511912345678",
    "document":"12345678901",
    "createdAt":"2022-03-19 12:34:55",
    "updatedAt":"2022-03-22 21:41:54"
  }
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:422
{
  "message":"The phone field is required. (and 1 more error)",
  "errors":{
    "phone":[
      "The phone field is required."
    ],
    "document":[
      "The document field is required."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: Upload photo
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Defines a profile picture for authenticated user.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| photo | File | Yes | Image file to be defined as profile picture.

```response:200
{
  "id":"62326a89a2360000f9001be3",
  "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
  "photo":"http:\/\/localhost:8000\/storage\/photos\/nqe9QjtDUBkJ6qbMoTMAvcOtv3CXoNfU5RJXV4ki.png",
  "personId":"62326a88a2360000f9001be2",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-16T22:54:01.013000Z",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-17T00:42:43.233000Z"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

resources.name: Delete photo
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Deletes authenticated user's profile picture.

```response:200
{
  "id":"62326a89a2360000f9001be3",
  "email":"guilherme@gmail.com",
  "photo":null,
  "personId":"62326a88a2360000f9001be2",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-16T22:54:01.013000Z",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-16T22:54:01.013000Z"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

resources.name: Create an address
resources.description:
#### **Description**
Creates an address for the authenticated user.

#### **Body Parameters**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description
|--|--|--|--
| street | String | Yes | Address Street.
| number | String | No | House/Apartment number.
| complement | Date | No | Address complement.
| district | String | Yes | Address district.
| city | String | Yes | Address city.
| state | String | Yes | Address state.
| country | String | Yes | Address country
| zipcode | String | Yes | Address zipcode.

```response:200
{
  "id":"6238ffa0516c00004c00599f",
  "street":"Avenida Paulista",
  "number":"123",
  "complement":"de 1300\/1301 a 1498\/1499",
  "district":"Sede",
  "city":"São Paulo",
  "state":"São Paulo",
  "country":"Brasil",
  "zipcode":"15370496",
  "personId":"6238feef516c00004c00599a",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-21 22:43:44",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-21 22:43:44"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:422
{
{
  "message":"The street field is required. (and 5 more errors)",
  "errors":{
    "street":[
      "The street field is required."
    ],
    "district":[
      "The district field is required."
    ],
    "city":[
      "The city field is required."
    ],
    "state":[
      "The state field is required."
    ],
    "country":[
      "The country field is required."
    ],
    "zipcode":[
      "The zipcode field is required."
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: List addresses
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves a list of all authenticated user's addresses.

```response:200
[
  {
    "id":"623a4c1a41eff1035a721aa2",
    "street":"Avenida Paulista",
    "number":"123",
    "complement":"de 1300\/1301 a 1498\/1499",
    "district":"Sede",
    "city":"São Paulo",
    "state":"São Paulo",

  }
]
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

resources.name: Show an address
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Retrieves an address using the given ID.

```response:200
{
  "id":"623a4c1a41eff1035a721aa2",
  "street":"Avenida Paulista",
  "number":"123",
  "complement":"de 1300\/1301 a 1498\/1499",
  "district":"Sede",
  "city":"São Paulo",
  "state":"São Paulo",
  "country":"Brasil",
  "zipcode":"15370496",
  "personId":"623a47953053e33ce25b0d82",
  "createdAt":"2022-03-22 22:22:18",
  "updatedAt":"2022-03-22 22:22:18"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```

```response:403
{
  "message":"This action is unauthorized."
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message":"Address not found."
}
```

resources.name: Delete an address
Search CEP
resources.description:
#### **Description**

Searches for a CEP using ViaCEP service.

```response:200
{
  "cep":"15370-496",
  "logradouro":"Avenida Paulista",
  "complemento":"de 1300\/1301 a 1498\/1499",
  "bairro":"Sede",
  "localidade":"Pereira Barreto",
  "uf":"SP",
  "ibge":"3537404",
  "gia":"5228",
  "ddd":"18",
  "siafi":"6849"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message":"Unauthenticated."
}
```
